page.title: 15A MORNING IN JAMES'LIFE.
page.content: I awake at 7.30a.m.and have a shower.I proceed to dress in grey school trousers,a white shirt with long sleeves,a grey school jumper,a school tie which is gold with red and black diagonal stripes and my black school shoes.I brush my teeth and "blow-dry" my hair.I make breakfast which consists of a bowl of cereal and a cup of tea.At 8.30 a.m.I walk to school with my sister.The school bell rings at 8.55 a.m.I begin work immediately on Language,Mathematics etc.The playtime bell rings at 10.35 a.m.The boys in my class play football in the playing field.I then carry on with a different type of work until the lunch hour begins at 12.15 p.m.I usually have lunch in the canteen,choosing fish and chips followed by bread and butter pudding and custard!
